title: Eco-Chic Urban Loft with Fireplace and Balcony in Creative Debniki
description: Step into a sun-soaked, modern loft featuring striking double-height ceilings and custom windows, offering 68 sqm of flexible, airy living space. The loft seamlessly blends a cozy sleeping zone, open-plan lounge with homely fireplace, elegant kitchen, two designer bathrooms, and a private balcony. Outfitted with a state-of-the-art smart home system, this home delivers comfort and convenience—effortlessly harmonizing eco-consciousness and contemporary living.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the heart of Krakow’s artistic Debniki, you'll enjoy riverfront promenades and a community known for local arts, dynamic cafes, and lively gatherings. Stroll or cycle riverside, or tap into convenient public transport and highway access. Experience urban energy and vibrant local life, just moments from the water and dynamic city center.
lifestyle_benefits: perfect for remote work and flexible schedules
easy outdoor activity access (waterfront and parks)
vibrant cafés and local culture right outside
target_buyer: Ideal for digital nomads or creative professionals seeking an inspiring workspace and home base, passionate about sustainability, design, and culture.
market_positioning: Rare opportunity to secure a stylish eco-smart loft in Debniki’s urban-creative quarter—perfectly balancing convenience, modern tech, and lifestyle amenities in a sought-after riverside location.
